scripts.clean: npx shx rm -rf tsconfig.tsbuildinfo dist coverage jest temp package-lock.json npm-shrinkwrap.json node_modules/* node_modules/.[!.]* node_modules/..?*
scripts.cleanBuild: npm shx rm -rf tsconfig.tsbuildinfo dist && npm run build
scripts.cleanBuildProduction: npx shx rm -rf tsconfig.tsbuildinfo dist && npm run buildProduction
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm install && npm link matterbridge && npm run build
scripts.git:hardreset:main: git fetch origin && git checkout main && git reset --hard origin/main
scripts.git:hardreset:dev: git fetch origin && git checkout dev && git reset --hard origin/dev
scripts.git:hardreset:edge: git fetch origin && git checkout edge && git reset --hard origin/edge
scripts.runMeBeforePublish: npm run lint && npm run format && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run cleanBuildProduction && npm pkg delete devDependencies scripts types && npx shx rm -rf node_modules/* node_modules/.[!.]* node_modules/..?* && npm install --omit=dev && npm shrinkwrap
scripts.npmPack: npx shx cp package.json package.json.backup && npm run prepublishOnly && npm pack && npx shx cp package.json.backup package.json && npx shx rm -rf package.json.backup && npm run reset
scripts.npmPublishTagDev: npx shx cp package.json package.json.backup && npm run prepublishOnly && npm publish --tag dev && npx shx cp package.json.backup package.json && npx shx rm -rf package.json.backup && npm run reset
scripts.npmPublishTagLatest: npx shx cp package.json package.json.backup && npm run prepublishOnly && npm publish --tag latest && npx shx cp package.json.backup package.json && npx shx rm -rf package.json.backup && npm run reset
scripts.install:dependencies: npm install --save-exact node-ansi-logger node-persist-manager moment mqtt
scripts.install:eslint: npm install --save-dev --save-exact @eslint/js typescript-eslint eslint-plugin-import eslint-plugin-n eslint-plugin-promise eslint-plugin-jsdoc
